ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] money problem
ygData.msgSnippet: I rarely have a problem finding sow with my enchanter.  I just /ooc WTT breeze for a sow.  I get many tells on that.  With my rogue however... Luckily she s a
ygData.messageBody:
I rarely have a problem finding sow with my enchanter.  I just /ooc WTT
breeze for a sow.  I get many tells on that.  With my rogue however...  
Luckily she's a wood elf.  I just sashay myself up to someone who can sow and
first /smile and then say May I trouble you for a Spirit of Wolf oh mighty
shaman (or druid or ranger) and then /smile again.  I rarely fail to get a
sow like this.  lol
Lena


I will generally ask for a sow in /ooc or /shout (shout only if really
really desperate-- with an offer to donate).
But I don't go looking for a specific person. I'll just ask "Can anyone cast
sow?" If someone says yes I ask them politely. If they say they don't have
mana or are too busy I say "Ok, thanks anyways".
luv,
-Su
